summary: AN ORDINANCE submitting a proposition to the qualified electors of the City of Seattle, at the general election to be held on November 2, 1999, to amend various articles and sections of the Charter of the City of Seattle to replace all exclusively male gender references with gender-neutral references; ratifying and confirming prior acts; calling on the City Clerk to certify the proposed amendment to the Director of Records and Election of King County and directing such Director to submit the proposition to City voters; and providing for the publication of such proposed amendment.
